meanings.definition: A collection of fan fiction stories written by fans of a particular TV show or book series.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading fanons about my favorite characters.
meanings.sent2: Many fans contribute to the fanons for the TV show.
meanings.sent3: The fanons made me laugh with their creative plots.
meanings.sent4: Her fanons were like a treasure trove of imaginative tales.
meanings.sent5: The fanons brought the fictional world to life in my mind.

meanings.definition: A type of religious garment worn by priests during certain ceremonies.
meanings.sent1: The priest put on his ceremonial fanons before the ritual.
meanings.sent2: The intricate design of the fanons added to the solemnity of the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The priest accidentally tripped on his fanons, causing a moment of lightheartedness.
meanings.sent4: The fanons draped around him like a cloak of reverence.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering fanons caught the light, creating a sacred aura.

meanings.definition: The feathers on a bird's neck.
meanings.sent1: The bird proudly displayed its colorful fanons.
meanings.sent2: The vibrant fanons of the peacock caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bird's fanons looked like a fancy collar.
meanings.sent4: Heron's fanons shimmered in the sunlight, a natural work of art.
meanings.sent5: The bird's fanons fluffed up when it felt threatened.
